job_title: Advanced Analytics Consultant at Health Care Service Corporation in Tulsa, OK
job_description:
The main component of this role will help collect, create and manage the data sets needed to drive our reporting and analysis. You will be working closely with our Analytics Consultants constructing the back-end data needs that drive the dashboards we deliver to our customers. This is a great opportunity for those that enjoy working in a fast paced, dynamic and collaborative environment. JOB REQUIREMENTS:
Bachelors' Degree and three (3) years' experience in health care services, statistical analysis, or insurance industry economics including one (1) year experience in data analysis and information reporting relating to healthcare data, including pharmacy - OR- Seven (7) years experience in health care services, statistical analysis, or insurance industry economics including one (1) year experience in data analysis and information reporting relating to healthcare data, including pharmacy. Uses best practices and knowledge of internal or external business issues to improve products or services Independently solves complex problems; takes a new perspective using existing solutions Works independently, receives minimal guidance Acts as a resource for colleagues with less experience; may direct the work of other staff members PREFERRED REQUIREMENTS:
Bachelors' degree Three (3) or more years of experience with data analysis and manipulation. Proficiency in Marketing data and campaign reporting. Proficiency in SQL or other data querying language, relational database concepts. Proficiency in Alteryx and data preparation. Proficiency in data analysis and information reporting, including obtaining an understanding of information repository issues and concepts. Experience in meeting facilitation and requirement gathering techniques. Knowledge of data visualization and representation tools like Tableau. Knowledge of data elements as they relate to data quality requirements. Experience using statistical concepts with an ability to apply to informatics reporting. Analytical, conceptual & root cause analysis skills. Adobe Analytics
Salary Range:
$100K -- $150K
Minimum Qualification
Data Science & Machine Learning, IT Consulting, Business Intelligence & AnalyticsEstimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.

Qualifications: Bachelors' Degree and three (3) years' experience in health care services, statistical analysis, or insurance industry economics including one (1) year experience in data analysis and information reporting relating to healthcare data, including pharmacy - OR- Seven (7) years experience in health care services, statistical analysis, or insurance industry economics including one (1) year experience in data analysis and information reporting relating to healthcare data, including pharmacy
Proficiency in Marketing data and campaign reporting
Proficiency in SQL or other data querying language, relational database concepts
Proficiency in Alteryx and data preparation
Proficiency in data analysis and information reporting, including obtaining an understanding of information repository issues and concepts
Experience in meeting facilitation and requirement gathering techniques
Knowledge of data visualization and representation tools like Tableau
Knowledge of data elements as they relate to data quality requirements
Experience using statistical concepts with an ability to apply to informatics reporting
Analytical, conceptual & root cause analysis skills
Responsibilities: The main component of this role will help collect, create and manage the data sets needed to drive our reporting and analysis
You will be working closely with our Analytics Consultants constructing the back-end data needs that drive the dashboards we deliver to our customers
